title: Export
content:
• Home
  • ››Manhattan Active® Supply Chain Planning
  • ››UI Help
  • ››Common Functions
  • ››Export

Export List

 

 

You can export the data by selecting the attributes to move to a different format, such as an excel spreadsheet.

 

To export the information on to your system, do the following:

  • Click Export to view the Export window.
  • Select the required column data to be exported. The information/data under the column names listed under Selected Column will be exported.
  • If u need to add more column data, drag and drop the column name from the Available list to the Selected column list.
Note: Optionally you can also remove the column name from the selected Column list.
  • Click Export to generate.CSV file in your local machine.
  • Open the.CSV file (preferably in Excel) to view the information.
  • Click Cancel Task button to cancel the export job.
